page.title: 16INTERVIEWING MR MITCHELL
page.content: We interviewed Mr Mitchell who lives in the village shop in Frant. He gets a lot of customers a day, he gets roughly 25O a day. His local customers come from out Tunbridge Wells way, Wadhurst and Mark Cross so he gets a good few customers. He delivers about 17OO papers a week. He sells mostly milk, he has two or three crates a day. Mr Mitchell enjoys his work very much, and has a lot of friends. He thinks the reaction of his customers would be terrible if the shop closed down luckily his shop has never been broken into, and he has very few complaints about the food he sells and he has a good reputation.
